2025 Ad Valorem Tax Rate and FY 2025-2026 City Budget

08-07-2025 By Resolution 2025-06-R, August 6, 2025, City Council approved a Proposed 2025 Ad Valorem Tax Rate of $0.495000. This rate is the same tax rate as 2024. Ordinance 2025-18_Adopted 2025 Ad Valorem Tax Rate Ordinance 2025-17_Adopted FY 2025-2026 City Budget Notice of Public Hearing on Tax Increase PUBLIC HEARING NOTICE_2025-2026 Proposed Budget & Tax Rate R ESOLUTION 2025-06-R_Proposed 2025 Ad Valorem Tax Rate Notice of 2025 Calculated Tax Rates Adopted Fiscal Year 2025-2026 Budget

New Precinct 4 Satellite Office

Bexar Appraisal District 2025 Notices of Appraised Value

On April 11, 2025, the Bexar Appraisal District (BCAD) mailed the 2025 Notices of Appraised $1,000 or more compared to the previous year. Property owners have until May 15, 2025, or 30 days after receiving their notice to appeal their appraised value.

Appeals can be submitted in person, by mail, or online using the Online Services Portal at www.bcad.org .

For assistance with filing an appeal or for more information, contact BCAD at 210-242-2432 or https://help.bcad.org

CANCELATION OF MAY 3, 2025 GENERAL ELECTION

SAINT HEDWIG'S MAY 3, 2025 GENERAL ELECTION IS CANCELED. THE FOLLOWING CANDIDATES HAVE BEEN CERTIFIED AS UNOPPOSED AND ARE HEREBY ELECTED AS FOLLOWS: City Council Place 1 - Dwayne Padalecki, Incumbent, Unopposed City Council Place 3 - Caid Frankowiak, Incumbent, Unopposed City Council Place 5 - John E. Hafner, Incumbent, Unopposed RESOLUTION 2025-03-R_ORDER OF CANCELATION

Purchase and Installation of a stand by Generator Bidding Information

The City of Saint Hedwig Texas is soliciting Request For Proposal (RFP) for purchase and installation of a 60 KW Diesel stand by Generator. The city will be using a Competitive Sealed Proposal (CSP) bid process. The Contract will be awarded based on BEST VALUE between the City and the top-ranked contractor. The project includes the purchasing, and complete installation of a 60 kw diesel generator Project Package Due March 28, 2025 at 3:00 pm For more information contact the City Manager 210-667-9568

March 6, 2025, 7:00 pm Saint Hedwig City Hall 13065 FM 1346, Saint Hedwig, TX 78152 Amendment to the City's 2007 Comprehensive Plan (Master Plan), and update to the City's 5/2/2019 Future Land Use Map The City Council invites all interested persons who wish to be heard on this item to attend. PUBLIC HEARING NOTICE DRAFT FUTURE LAND USE PLAN DRAFT FUTURE LAND USE MAP

Truck Route Ordinance 2025-04

THE CITY OF SAINT HEDWIG, TEXAS. ORDINANCE NO. 2025-04. AN ORDINANCE OF THE CITY COUNCIL OF THE CITY OF SAINT HEDWIG, TEXAS, REGULATING TRUCK TRAFFIC ON PUBLIC STREETS DESIGNATED AS NO THROUGH TRUCK STREETS; PROVIDING FOR INSTALLATION OF SIGNS; PROVIDING FOR PENALTIES; PROVIDING FOR SEVERABLITY; AND PROVIDING AN EFFECTIVE DATE. Any person who violates any provision of this article shall be guilty of a misdemeanor, and upon conviction, shall be fined not more than five hundred ($500.00) dollars. Any law enforcement officer is hereby authorized to issue a citation for violations of this article. To see complete ordinance, visit the City of Saint Hedwig website, sainthedwigcity.com. PASSED AND APPROVED the 5th day of February, 2025. VIEW ORDINANCE 2025-04 Truck Route Map

Volunteer Opportunities

Future Land Use Plan Update Open House

Help Envision Saint Hedwig’s Future

January 23

The City of Saint Hedwig is nearing the end of the process to update the Future Land Use Plan element of the City’s Master Plan. An open house will be held at City Hall to present the proposed amendments to the Future Land Use Plan & Map and gather feedback from citizens.

January 23 , 2025, from 6-8pm, at City Hall - 13065 FM 1346.

Citizens are invited to attend this meeting and encouraged to participate in the sharing of ideas about the future of Saint Hedwig.

more information contact City Hall at (210) 667-9568 NOTICE OF POSSIBLE QUORUM

Budget & Tax Rate

THE CITY OF SAINT HEDWIG ADOPTED A TAX RATE THAT WILL RAISE MORE TAXES FOR MAINTENANCE AND OPERTATIONS THAN LAST YEAR'S TAX RATE. THE TAX RATE WILL EFFECTIVELY BE RAISED BY -0.12 PERCENT AND WILL RAISE TAXES FOR MAINTENANCE AND OPERATIONS ON A $100,000 HOME BY APPROXIMATELY $0.00 Adopted 2024 Ad Valorem Tax Rate_Ordinance 2024-11 Adopted FY 2024-2025 City Budget_Ordinance 2024-10 9/12/24 Public Hearing Notice (Proposed Budget & Tax Rate) Notice of Public Hearing on Tax Increase Proposed FY 2024-2025 City Budget Proposed 2024 Tax Rate_Resolution 2024-08-R 2024 Tax Rate Notice

Applications for appointment to the City's Board of Adjustment are currently being accepted. Deadline to apply has been extended to November 27, 2024, 5:00 p.m. If you wish to apply, submit the application below to: City Manager Maria Hernandez citymanager@sainthedwigcity.com BOA APPLICATION

Annex Renovation Bidding information

The City of Saint Hedwig ("Owner") proposes to renovate the existing City Hall Annex Building at 13035 FM 1346, Saint Hedwig, TX 78152, using a Competitive Sealed Proposal (CSP) bid process Project Package Drawings Due Date has changed to Friday, November 8th Proposals are due November 8, 2024 by 3:00 PM

Am I a Resident of the City of Saint Hedwig?

If you have a Saint Hedwig address, click link below to determine if you are a: 1. Resident of the City of Saint Hedwig, residing inside the city limits 2. Non-resident, residing outside the city limits, within the City's ETJ (extraterritorial jurisdiction) CLICK HERE

Outdoor Burning

OUTDOOR BURNING WITHIN THE SAINT HEDWIG CITY LIMITS

Outdoor burning is allowed within the Saint Hedwig city limits per Ordinance 2022-27. No permit is required, but residents are required to follow Bexar County burning regulations as posted on the Bexar County Fire Marshal website Ordinance 2022-27

AN ORDINANCE OF THE CITY COUNCIL OF THE CITY OF SAINT HEDWIG, TEXAS, REGULATING TRUCK TRAFFIC ON PUBLIC STREETS DESIGNATED AS NO THROUGH TRUCK STREETS; PROVIDING FOR INSTALLATION OF SIGNS; PROVIDING FOR PENALTIES; PROVIDING FOR SEVERABLITY; AND PROVIDING AN EFFECTIVE DATE. Any person who violates any provision of this article shall be guilty of a misdemeanor, and upon conviction, shall be fined not more than five hundred ($500.00) dollars. Any law enforcement officer is hereby authorized to issue a citation for violations of this article. PASSED AND APPROVED the 5th day of February, 2025. Click here to read entire Ordinance 2025-04

STAR PARTY

OBSERVE THE NIGHT SKY AND LEARN ABOUT CONSTELLATIONS AND THE PLANETS! Presented by the San Antonio Astronomical Association And The City of Saint Hedwig

Take turns looking through telescopes brought by local astronomers and see the Constellations and Jupiter. To find out what will be in the sky on Saturday March 2, 2024 click below https://nightsky.jpl.nasa.gov/event-view.cfm?Event_ID=137737 Please bring a Red-Light Flashlight BYOC- Bring your own chair Dress for the weather

March 2, 2024 6:30 to 8:30 PM Saint Hedwig City Park 13065 FM 1346 For more information call City Hall  210-667-9568

Road Closed to Thru Traffic

The City of Saint Hedwig is going to be Repairing a Culvert on N. Graytown Rd Between Mihlski Ln and N. Lupon And will be closing the street for traffic beginning Monday, January 8th, 2024. Please follow the detour map if traveling on this area If you have any questions call City Hall 210-667-9568
